title: Learning Something New
description: Kevin talks about learning English in his free time and his future plans.
speaker: Kevin
text: Recently, I decided to learn something new in my free time.
Last month, I started taking online English lessons after work.
At first, it was difficult to understand everything, and I felt a little frustrated.
I practiced for about thirty minutes every evening and tried to listen carefully.
Slowly, I noticed that my listening skills were improving.
I could understand more words and complete the exercises faster.
Next month, I am going to join a conversation group to practice speaking.
I will also watch English videos without subtitles to challenge myself.
I believe this experience will help me become more confident in English.
